ModMetaData.name: Double Barrel Pulse Rifle
ModMetaData.author: TheGoofyOne
ModMetaData.description:
The Double Barrel Pulse Rifle
With two barrels, this pulse rifle is a force to be reckoned with. It doesn't shoot quite as far but has double the pulse fires.
Vanilla Charge Rifle Range - 25.9 Double Barrel Pulse rifle - 23.9 Vanilla Charge Rifle Burst Count - 3 Double Barrel Pulse Rifle Burst Count - 6.
Takes an additional component and 10 additional plasteel to create Uses standard charge shot bullets. All other stats are the same.
